extendedInfo.description: The best and most comprehensive Android Security for maximum protection! * Antivirus, Malware, Spyware protection * Backup & Data recovery * Real-time monitor * Anti-theft and protection against losses * Credit card protection & Identity theft protection * Full customer support in local languageMYAndroid Protection has proudly been chosen and awarded "The BEST anti virus app in whole Android Market" by Chief Editor, Steen Jorgensen, ANDROID Magasinet.Android 2.0 and up, please use this one: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.mymobileprotection20 Special Upgrade Offer Available Right NOW: Save 70% for MYAndroid PREMIUMUpgrade NOW for only 3.99 USD for 3 months Protection plus Free and Unlimited email and phone response.Please visit here to read more: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.myandroidprotection20PREMWhy should you install a security product like MYAndroid Protection?Today we share private information with friends and other contacts via sites like Facebook and Myspace, Yahoo mail, Gmail, Hotmail, and MSN. Private user accounts on these sites have all been hacked by Internet criminals.Lots of virus and spyware come from browsing the Internet through Google, Firefox and Internet Explorer.Online trading and online banking is also these days normal for most of us. Credit card protection and fraud prevention when purchasing online via sites like Ebay, Amazon or even online shops like Wal-Mart and Best Buy is simply needed.***More details on what's included in MYAndroid Protection FREE trial:Anti virus protection * Block virus, malware, spyware with anti-virus and security * Ensures emails, contacts, bookmarks and text messages are safe * Scans media files for malicious software * Can be run daily, weekly, or on demand * Real-time anti virus monitor * Anti virus scan every app you download to ensure its safe * Get anti virus protection against the latest threats with automatic anti virus updatesBackup and backup recovery * Contact backup and restore * Backup to SD Card * Backup to WebAnti-Theft protection * Remote Lock * Find your lost or stolen phone by locating it on a map * Activate a loud alarm to find your phone nearby, even if it is on silent * Remote Wipe to delete personal data from accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, and YouTube that are connected to your phoneThe awarded technology behind MYAndroid Protection has more than 60 million happy users.The technology behind MYAndroid Protection has in comparison to e.g. Lookout, Droidsecurity, Norton Mobile Security and AVG Mobile Security already received many awards including the prestigious "Frost & Sullivan mobile security market leader" award.KW:  Seguridad, ProtecciÃ³n, Buscar mi telÃ©fono, TelÃ©fono perdido, Localizador de telÃ©fono, ProtecciÃ³n contra virus, Troyano, Malware, Spyware, MobileSecurity, Bloquear telÃ©fonoSecurity, Protection, Antivirus, Anti-virus, Anti virus,***Why should you choose products from www.mymobilesecurity.com?We are having more than 20 years experience in the PC and Internet security industry behind us. The strategy behind MYMobile Security is to deliver the best and widest products range within mobile security.We have wide product range which all have cutting edge technology. We consider ourselves as one of the clear leaders within mobile security together and in several instances even further advanced than our recognized competitors like: Kaspersky, Norton, NetQin, AVG, Antivirus FREE, Dr.Web, Anti-Virus FREE, Lookout, Super Task Killer, GuardX Antivirus, Blue Point Antivirus and DroidSecurity.Like MYMobile Security on Facebookhttp://facebook.com/mymobileappsFollow MYMobile Security on Twitterhttp://twitter.com/MYMobileSec
